definitions.definition: ( Canada , US , Australia , Ireland ) An item of furniture , often upholstered , for the comfortable seating of more than one person; a sofa .
( art , painting and gilding ) A preliminary layer , as of colour or size .
( brewing ) A mass of steeped barley spread upon a floor to germinate , in malting ; or the floor occupied by the barley.

examples: He spent years on the couch going over his traumatic childhood.

definitions.definition: ( figurative , politics , usually as "the couch" ) Voters who opt out of voting , usually by staying home on their couch .
examples: If Kamala Harris replaces Joe Biden in the 2024 election, analysts warn that she will lose to the couch .

main_definition: ( Canada , US , Australia , Ireland ) An item of furniture , often upholstered , for the comfortable seating of more than one person; a sofa .
secondary_definitions: ( art , painting and gilding ) A preliminary layer , as of colour or size .
( brewing ) A mass of steeped barley spread upon a floor to germinate , in malting ; or the floor occupied by the barley.
( figurative , politics , usually as "the couch" ) Voters who opt out of voting , usually by staying home on their couch .

definitions.definition: Couch grass , a species of persistent grass , Elymus repens , usually considered a weed .

main_definition: Couch grass , a species of persistent grass , Elymus repens , usually considered a weed .
